petNameAdd:
1) STATE OF ASSAM
    Advocate - Tapan Kumar Bhattacharya

business_details.Business: Accused is present. Heard argument for both sides. Judgement is delivered in open court.The prosecution has failed to prove its case u/s 10 of POCSO Act against the accused beyond all reasonable doubt . Hence he accused is not guilty u/s 10 of POCSO Act.Accordingly , the accused is acquitted and set at liberty.The bailbond stands canceled and the bailor is discharge from all liabilites.The case is disposed of.
